data.title: Global Language Services
data.meta_description: Dari / دری Dari is the variety of Persian spoken in Afghanistan, where it holds official language status alongside Pashto. Dari is spoken by between 25 and 50 percent of people in Afghanistan, with the majority of the remaining population speaking Pashto, Uzbeck or Turkmen.
data.text:
Competitive Pricing

We pride ourselves on not only providing a quality service but also ensuring affordability for our customers.

Professionalism Guaranteed

With an educational background in linguistics, our Glasgow–based translations team know the ins and outs of the translation industry, and are always more than happy to offer clients the benefit of our experience and eye for the pitfalls of translation.

Accreditation

We currently hold ISO 9001:2008, ISO 17100:2015, ISO 27001:2013 and Cyber Essentials accreditations. We are also a member of the Institute of Translation and Interpreting.

Security

Security is a top priority at Global Language Services Ltd. All our staff and linguists are required to sign NDAs. We also transmit documentation via encrypted software. Rest assured that we will treat your information with the strictest confidence.

People not Processors

At Global Language Services Ltd, we believe that your translation should be carried out by a qualified, expert linguist rather than a machine. No machine can pick up on the complexity and nuances of language that a trained linguist can.

Considerable Experience

Established in 2001, Global Language Services Ltd has been providing cost-effective and high-quality translation and interpreting services for almost two decades. Let our wealth of experience do the talking.

“That is fantastic –thank you so much. It will make it much easier at this end to match the voice over doing it in a table this way. It is also great that you can make our very tight timescale. What a great service you provide!”

Call Us +44 (0)141 429 3429

Contact Global Language Services Ltd to speak with one of our advisors about your specific requirements.

Or Get A Quote

Fill in the form to receive a prompt, no obligation quote from Global Language Services Ltd.

Get A Quote
